section.name: Project Export
section.p: The Project Export is a functionality for developers. It allows to conveniently export any customized content from the repository. This includes configurations, namespaces (with document types, aka backend templates) and document trees. Such exports of customized content are necessary in order to include the customized content to the sources of a project. They are imported automatically when initializing a fresh content repository. Doing the exports by hand is quite tedious. The Project Export functionality is more convenient.

li.a: I don't know why customized content should be exported
